about_the_game: The Medic Savior Skin Pack includes a new pack of weapon skins for each of the Medic characters: Val, Lazarus, and Caira. Buy the pack and save!
detailed_description: The Medic Savior Skin Pack includes a new pack of weapon skins for each of the Medic characters: Val, Lazarus, and Caira. Buy the pack and save!

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-920 / A8-3870K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
